column4: BRIEF-AMD Processors Exposed To Both variants of Spectre security flaw
column5: * AMD SAYS WE BELIEVE GOOGLE PROJECT ZERO VARIANT 1 CAN BE CONTAINED WITH AN OS PATCH & WE HAVE BEEN WORKING WITH OS PROVIDERS TO ADDRESS THIS ISSUE

column4: Signal partners with Microsoft to encrypt Skype messages
column5: Encrypted messaging app Signal said it had partnered with Microsoft Corp to encrypt messages on the technology giant's online communications service  Skype.

column4: UPDATE 5-Nvidia updates software  says graphic chips not hit by flaws
column5: Jan 10 Nvidia Corp is updating the software for its graphics processors in response to the Spectre security threat  but its chief executive said on Wednesday its chips were not subject to the same risks as those from Intel and other companies.
